Revco Solutions brings over 75 years of healthcare revenue cycle experience, utilizing the latest omni-channel patient communications and innovative intelligence tools. We provide services that assist healthcare facilities with: • Patient Access • Insurance Denials Management & Follow Up • Early Out Self-Pay AR Management • Primary & Secondary Bad Debt Collections • Legacy AR Wind Down Projects • Special Projects Additionally, we have earned industry leading security and compliance certifications, including HITRUST r2 certification, the highest level available. Revco Solutions’ culture of service is based on the principles of performance, patient experience, and protection, which enables us to provide a high level of service, resulting in industry leading results. Utilizing a patient-centric approach, everything we do is geared towards providing a positive patient experience. Managing billions in placements annually from hundreds of physician practices, hospitals, and health systems, our partners trust Revco Solutions to care for their patients.
